title: Sister Judy - The Name Game (HD)
author: Sophie H
comment: Fact: Jessica Lange wanted to do this fun scene because of how depressing the whole season was, and she wanted to do something fun and uplifting
This scene was for us, the audience. We needed it. Even if it was just for a moment. The torture, the sadness, the insanity.. And gave us a little break to one of the hardest seasons.

People who didn't watched ahs: I don't wanna watch this bc it is sooo scary

ahs: tHe NaAaAmE gAaAme
I love Sarah Paulsons expressions during this

Lana to Kit: 😰🤷🏻‍♀️
Also her a second later: 💃🏼💃🏼
description: My favourite moment from American Horror Story Asylum - Jessica Lange as Sister Judy, bringing a bit of Glee to a seriously scary series...
